description: Try our easy to follow Sesame Crusted Salmon With Soba Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Low saturated fat,High protein,Roast,Low sugar,Asparagus,Valentine's Day,Salmon
name: Sesame Crusted Salmon With Soba Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch asparagus, ends trimmed, halved lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: In a shallow dish, mix together sweet soy, sesame oil, ginger and chilli flakes. Lay the fish in the marinade, skin-side up, and set aside for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Place sesame seeds onto a plate. Lift fillets from the marinade and press flesh side down onto the sesame seeds to coat. Transfer to baking tray, skin-side down. Lay asparagus alongside the fish and roast both for 15 minutes, or until done to your liking. Serve fish with asparagus and noodles.
